summary: Email correspondence between an FBI Special Agent and Delta Airlines representative Judy Gorham regarding a subpoena for flight records from 1994-1998. The FBI is seeking records related to child exploitation/human trafficking, but Delta states they only maintain records for 36 months and cannot provide the requested historical data.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: The FBI agent is corresponding with Delta Airlines to obtain flight records via a subpoena related to child exploitation/human trafficking investigations.

persons.name: Judy Gorham
persons.context: Judy Gorham is the Delta Airlines employee responding to the FBI's subpoena for flight records, informing them that Delta only maintains records for 36 months and cannot provide data from 1994-1998.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
connections.description: The FBI agent is investigating and subpoenaing Delta Airlines for records, with Judy Gorham as the point of contact responding to the legal request.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to Delta Airlines
events.description: The FBI issued a subpoena to Delta Airlines Inc. requesting flight records, likely as part of an investigation into child exploitation/human trafficking.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

events.title: Delta's Initial Response to Subpoena
events.description: Judy Gorham of Delta Airlines responded to the FBI subpoena, attaching requested records but noting Delta only maintains records for 36 months and cannot provide data from 1994-1998.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

events.title: FBI Follow-up on Missing Attachment
events.description: The FBI agent followed up with Judy Gorham, noting that the email response mentioned attached records but no attachment was included, requesting the attachment be sent.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

events.title: Clarification and Final Response
events.description: Judy Gorham requested clarification on who the subpoena was for, and the FBI agent resent the original subpoena for reference.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

keyFacts: The FBI was actively subpoenaing Delta Airlines for flight records in 2020 as part of a child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.
Delta Airlines informed the FBI they only maintain flight records for 36 months, making records from 1994-1998 unavailable.
The subpoena was specifically dated January 23, 2020, indicating ongoing investigative efforts years after Epstein's death.
The correspondence shows the FBI's New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit was involved in seeking historical travel data.
